MecanDialogue: ^MECAN: Hello! I hope you’re having fun at the Aster Festival!
^COSMO: Oh.. Baby I know… Go on...
^MECAN: Your little screen, and your little shoulder blades, you look so amazing!! I wonder what sort of water you’re powered by...
TheRest: ^COSMO: As I should! Oh, I love this!! FINALLY!! The recognition I deserve!! Yes!! Shower me in all the compliments you have!!
^MECAN: Us Marquina are so interested in all sorts of technology! It’s kind of our thing. Even this dinky, old, cruddy hardware is so interesting to look at!!
^COSMO: Wait what, excuse me? Dinky? Cruddy?!?
^MECAN: Oh, our head-engineer Parato would have loved to have seen such a feat of old technology! Shame that he’s out on a repair job...
^COSMO: Okay Cielle I’m ready to go now… I was having such a good time and I’m feeling so attacked right now…
^CIELLE: Haha!! You one hundred percent deserved all that, Cosmo!
